10903.title: This service receives your location through GPS coordinates

tosdr.case: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
tosdr.tldr: The privacy policy establishes in "Information That We Collect Automatically:" that "Specifically this collected information may include IP addresses, device type, unique device identification numbers, browser type, broad geographic location (e.g. country or city-level location)".

11268.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
tosdr.tldr: The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in the first line after the title that is "(Effective as of September 9, 2020)", this information is valid at 13/11/2020

11269.title: The terms for this service are translated into different languages

tosdr.case: The terms for this service are translated into different languages
tosdr.tldr:
There are multiple language options for the privacy police. Ej:
Spanish: https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=es
English: https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en
France: https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=41&category=1000021150&knowledge=1060295165&language=fr

11271.title: The service collects many different types of personal data

tosdr.case: Many different types of personal data are collected
tosdr.tldr:
I cant annotate 2 points on a same paragraph, in the privaty policy you can read that... "Information including user name, address, phone number, and email address, will be collected at the time of user registration on the Site. If you are registering an AliExpress account through social media platforms
such as Facebook or Twitter, we may collect your account name and profile photo at those platforms. 

·If you choose to answer our supplemental questionnaires for registered members, we may also collect marital status, nationality, gender, date and/or year of birth, annual income, monthly spending and user preferences.

If you prefer not to provide such information, the use of our services and products will not be affected.

" You can see that the service collects multiple personal data

11280.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
tosdr.tldr:
The privacy police is not updated, in the updated privacy policy(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en), it states that:
"Third parties that are engaged by us to provide verification services,such as conducting suitable money laundering, fraud and “Know Your Customer” checks on Buyers and Sellers. This may include your name, email address, company details and contact information."

11282.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

tosdr.case: Some personal data may be kept after the end of the data retention period or a request for erasure
tosdr.tldr:
The privacy police is not updated, in the updated privacy policy(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en), there's a new point(D. Retention) that it states that:

"For example, if you are a registered member, certain data will be retained for a length of time following termination or deletion of your account, in order to comply with applicable laws or in case of disputes"

11283.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.

tosdr.case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
tosdr.tldr: The privacy police is not updated, in the updated privacy policy(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en), there's a new point(What about other tracking technologies, like web beacons?) and it states that: We may use other, similar technologies from time to time, like web beacons (sometimes called “tracking pixels” or “clear gifs”).

11302.quoteText: Alibaba.com does not endorse, verify or otherwise certify the contents of any comments or other material or information (including User Content) created, submitted, posted, displayed or otherwise made by any Member.
11302.title: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents

tosdr.case: This service does not condone any ideas contained in its user-generated contents
tosdr.tldr: Generated through the annotate view

11303.quoteText: and otherwise use any or all of the User Content in any form, media, or technology now known or not currently known in any manner, on the Sites, Alibaba Channels and/or Third Party Channels and for any purpose which may be beneficial, whether directly or indirectly, to Alibaba.com,
11303.title: The service can distribute your content through any media known now or in the future

tosdr.case: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
tosdr.tldr: Generated through the annotate view

11306.quoteText: Alibaba.com may cancel or terminate a User’s member account if Alibaba.com has reasons to suspect that the User has concurrently registered or is in control of two or more member accounts.
11306.title: Service does not allow alternative accounts

tosdr.case: Alternative accounts are not allowed
tosdr.tldr: Generated through the annotate view

11307.quoteText: You agree not to undertake any action to undermine the integrity of the computer systems or networks of Alibaba.com and/or any other User nor to gain unauthorized access to such computer systems or networks.
11307.title: This service prohibits users from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems

tosdr.case: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
tosdr.tldr: Generated through the annotate view

11315.title: This service uses third-party cookies for statistics

tosdr.case: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
tosdr.tldr:
The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "F.COOKIES" in "Why we use cookies?" that:

"We also use cookies to enable us to track and target the interests of Platform visitors to enhance the experience on our Platform by researching visiting patterns and conducting interest-based advertising; assisting our partners in tracking user visits to the Platforms; and to track progress and participation in promotions and the success of our email marketing campaigns. We use first and third party cookies for these purposes."

tosdr.case: First-party cookies are used
tosdr.tldr:
The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "F.COOKIES" in the first cell of the table below that:
"Essential Cookies These cookies are strictly necessary for enabling access and use of our Platform. They provide necessary functionality to ensure the proper performance, security and functionality of our Platform. These cookies cannot be disabled."

11319.title: This service employs third-party cookies, but with opt-out instructions

tosdr.case: Third party cookies are employed, but with opt out instructions
tosdr.tldr:
The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "F.COOKIES" in the table cell about "Analytics Cookies:" in the last column it is written that:
"To refuse these cookies, please follow the instructions below under the heading "How can I control cookies?" "

11320.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels

tosdr.case: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
tosdr.tldr:
The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "F.COOKIES" in the table below:

"Social Networking Cookies: These cookies are used to enable you to share pages and content that you find interesting on our Platform through third party social networking and other websites.These cookies may also be used for advertising purposes too."

11321.title: This service tracks you on other websites

tosdr.case: This service tracks you on other websites
tosdr.tldr: The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "F.COOKIES" in "What about other tracking technologies, like web beacons?" that: " These are tiny graphics files that contain a unique identifier that enable us to recognise when someone has visited our Platform or opened an e-mail that we have sent them. This allows us, for example, to monitor the traffic patterns of users from one page within our Platform to another".

11322.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data

tosdr.case: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
tosdr.tldr:
The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "Your Rights" that:

"The right to complain to a data protection authority about our collection and use of your personal information. For more information, please contact your local data protection authority."

11323.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

tosdr.case: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
tosdr.tldr: The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "F.COOKIES" in "What about other tracking technologies, like web beacons?" that: "These are tiny graphics files that contain a unique identifier that enable us to recognise when someone has visited our Platform or opened an e-mail that we have sent them. This allows us, for example, to monitor the traffic patterns of users from one page within our Platform to another, to deliver or communicate with cookies, to understand whether you have come to our Platform from an online advertisement displayed on a third-party website,"

11331.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify users regarding government inquiries that may involve users' personal data

tosdr.case: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data
tosdr.tldr:
The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "Legal Basis for Data Processing" that:

"If we ask you to provide personal information to comply with a legal requirement or to enter into a contract with you, we will make this clear at the relevant time and advise you whether the provision of your personal information is mandatory or not (as well as of the possible consequences if you do not provide your personal information). In some instances, you may be required to provide us with personal information for processing as described above, in order for us to be able to provide you all of our services, and for you to use all the features of our Platform."

11332.title: The services will notify users if personal data has been affected by data breaches

tosdr.case: You will be notified if personal data has been affected by data breaches
tosdr.tldr: The privacy police is not updated, in the updated privacy policy(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en). The privacy policy establishes in "Security Measures" that:"Upon becoming aware of a data breach, we will notify you and the regulatory authorities in accordance with the timescales and scope required by applicable data protection law".

11333.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

tosdr.case: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
tosdr.tldr:
The privacy police is not updated, the updated privacy police(https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en) states in "https://service.aliexpress.com/page/knowledge?pageId=37&category=1000022028&knowledge=1060015216&language=en":

"If we collect and use your personal information in reliance on our legitimate interests (or those of any third party), this interest will normally be to operate our Platform and services, manage our relationship with you and communicate with you as necessary to provide our services to you and for our legitimate commercial interest, for instance, when responding to your queries, improving our Platform and our services, undertaking marketing, or for the purposes of ensuring the security of our Platform and services and detecting or preventing illegal activities such as fraud. We may have other legitimate interests and if appropriate we will make clear to you at the relevant time what those legitimate interests are."
